name: Brain Flayer
text: ≪First, allow me introduce myself. I am called Arsal, and I am one who travels across dimensions.≫

name: Sakura
text: Ar... sal...?

name: Brain Flayer
text: ≪The correct pronunciation is a bit more complicated, but I simplified it so that lower lifeforms like yourselves are able understand it.≫

name: Rinko
text: ...Yeah, let's just kill him, right little brother?

name: Me
text: H-Hold on, nee-chan! Um, Arsal? What do you mean by... travelling across dimensions?

name: Brain Flayer
text: ≪It means that we can travel freely and comfortably between dimensions, utilizing the pinnacle of technology, which we produced.≫

name: Me
text: Traveling between dimensions... I've heard about that. If I remember correctly, a UFS scholar published a theory about a multi-dimensional universe... And this would mean that he was correct.

name: Brain Flayer
text: ≪You didn't even know that? Very well then, I will explain it easily so that even lower lifeforms like yourselves can understand.≫

name: Brain Flayer
text: ≪A dimension, or a "world" as you call it, is like a drop of water floating in a five-dimensional universe.≫

name: Brain Flayer
text: ≪And we are moving through this five-dimensional universe, moving between drops of water, between "worlds."≫

name: Me
text: So that means you came from another drop of water?

name: Brain Flayer
text: ≪Precisely.≫

name: Brain Flayer
text: ≪Our dimension is undergoing critically dangerous environmental change.≫

name: Brain Flayer
text: ≪Therefore we are searching for a dimension suitable for a highly intelligent species like us.≫

name: Brain Flayer
text: ≪And are currently doing surveys in several dimensions, while also exterminating the local pests.≫

name: Me
text: And that's how you ended up in this dimension...
That must mean that Rinko-senpai and I had ended up in this dimension because we somehow got caught up in this octopus's dimensional travel.

name: Rinko
text: You make it all sound so nice, but the point is that you are an interdimensional invader. Right, I'm going to cut you down.

name: Brain Flayer
text: ≪Wait! Wait! It is true that the majority of us think that we should simply exterminate all lower lifeforms.≫

name: Brain Flayer
text: ≪But I don't agree! I'm an environmental conservationist!≫

name: Sakura
text: An environ... mental... conservation... ist?

name: Brain Flayer
text: ≪I am campaigning for the conservation of the natural environment of the dimension we migrate to. Of course, only up to the point where it doesn't interfere with our move.≫

name: Brain Flayer
text: ≪I promise we are going to set up a nature reserve for you, somewhere at the edge of this world!≫

name: Brain Flayer
text: ≪I'm sure even pests like you have something worth living for. We should not belittle you just because you are inferior to us!≫

name: Sakura
text: ...Hey, can I just kill him?

name: Me
text: W-Wait, Sakura!
I would have liked to kill him just as much. But if we killed him, we might not be able to get back to our original world.

name: Me
text: There is one thing I would like to ask. When you travel between dimensions, is there a chance that other people get dragged with you?

name: Brain Flayer
text: ≪Of course there is! Each jump between dimensions puts a lot of stress on the surrounding space.≫

name: Brain Flayer
text: ≪You might bring lower lifeforms from a totally different dimension with you, and sometimes those species even start a war with the indigenous species!≫

name: Brain Flayer
text: ≪But that is a small price to pay to ensure the future of our highly advanced species! Ahaha!≫
Rinko-senpai was already silently exuding a threatening aura.

name: Me
text: R-Rinko nee-chan, please wait! So that we can return!
At least we now knew why we had arrived at this strange Gosha Academy.

name: Me
text: (Now all we have to do is to somehow get back to our original world, but... hm?)
*Sheeeeeeeeewwww*...
There was a sound as if something was cutting through the air.

name: Brain Flayer
text: ≪Ah.≫

name: Rinko
text: !! Something's falling from the sky!!
...aaaaAAAAHHHH...

name: Shikanosuke
text: AHHHHHHHHHHH

name: Me
text: Shikanosuke?!
*THUD*
It was Shikanosuke who had come falling from the sky. And behind himー
*THUMP! THUMP! TH-THUMP! THUMP!*

name: Shikanosuke
text: Aieee! They came after meeeee!!?

name: Monsters
text: GIYYYY☆ミT■SH●HGGGGッ!!!

name: Me
text: Wh-What what!?
Monsters I had never seen before fell from the sky and chased after Shikanosuke, shouting in a language I had never heard before.

name: Me
text: R-Rinko nee-chan...

name: Rinko
text: I don't really know what's going on, but... Uehara! I'm on my way!!!

name: Sakura
text: Hm? Another little brother?

name: Rinko
text: Eh!? Um... probably!!

name: Monsters
text: GIYYAAA●H☆Tミ■SHRRRRッ!!!

name: Rinko
text: Here they come...!!
